name: Threads of the Past
description:
While flying through the dark cavern you encounter remnants of an old civilization. Can you find out what happend to the people who are now long gone?

Let us know in the comments what you've managed to figure out about the caves' twisted past.

Tutorial Information

The goal of the prototype is to free all the butterflies from the dark cage that surrounds them. 

To do this, you must draw triangles between the different pillars in the environment. If the triangle encloses the butterfly, it is freed.

To draw a triangle, you need 3 different pillars:

  • Select a pillar with △ while flying close to the object. 
  • Then, select a second and third pillar the same way you did the first.
  • Go back to the first pillar and select it again.

Once you’ve freed all the butterflies, a portal will open to a new environment. This concludes the current gameplay of the prototype.

This prototype can be played with a PS3 / PS4 controller or a keyboard and mouse.
